biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Alexa Davalos (born May 28, 1982) is an American actress. She has appeared in several Hollywood films, including Feast of Love, The Chronicles of Riddick, The Mist, Defiance, and Clash of the Titans.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Alexa Davalos, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.​
